name: Unexpected Frappucino Occurances
description:
Your goal is to make the alien happy, and you heard that they drink their coffee sweet!

But horrible chickens want to get your sugar! Will you be able to drop the sugar in the cup?

People said about this game:

 "Would play for free again!"

                                      -Dave

This game as been made by:


Daria Kutepowa
